pages.text: $(li)Lionfish are hostile aquatic creatures that can be found near corals in warm and unfrozen oceans.$(br)$(li)If you are near of them, they will inflict Nausea and Poison effects to you.$(br)$(li)They may drop Raw Lionfish or Bone Meal on death.
They can be captured in a Bucket, which can be used as a trap in a Dispenser.
